tuv.seg: By default, new terms will have their match type set to fuzzy, which will work well for words such as agreement as Memsource will also match agreements to this term.

tuv.prop: Therefore, it is advisable to set the match type for abbreviations, for instance, to {1>exact<1}.

To improve matching for terms with rich morphology (for instance when part of the word changes), a boundary between the word stem (that does not change) and the suffix (that changes) can be defined by inserting a pipe ("|")
tuv.seg: This is expressed by setting the term to true for the column header exact.
